673f06ffd971eef67d8cc504 description: You there, dog! Hand over your cash! Don't try anything smart. Drop your- Hold on a second. Let me see your face... Ahh, the prophecies were true after all. For you to be the chosen one, for you to be the one who escapes... But for that, you'll need my assistance. Find me a GPhone; make sure you don't get it from a trader. I'll reward you handsomely. Follow my guidance, and you shall reveal the secrets held underneath us this very moment - in Tarkov's underground.
673f06ffd971eef67d8cc504 startedMessageT: Don't let me down, Operator. The wheels of fate turn fast.
673f06ffd971eef67d8cc504 acceptPlayerMes: Don't let me down, Operator. The wheels of fate turn fast.
673f06ffd971eef67d8cc504 successMessageT: Well done. We shall meet again, should you stay alive until then.
673f06ffd971eef67d8cc504 completePlayerM: Well done. We shall meet again, should you stay alive until then.
673f0668cb0fd5b0d77c4b59: Hand over 1 found in raid Broken GPhone
6740b1c44382955ae7e87eb9 description: Feel like expanding your wardrobe, eh? Want to feel a little bit more special? Decorate your gear? No worries, I got you. Bring me some materials, and I'll make sure you have access to my... lets say "expanded stock". Shadows guide you.
6740b1c44382955ae7e87eb9 successMessageT: Well done, Operator. These will be put to good use.
6740b1c44382955ae7e87eb9 completePlayerM: Well done, Operator. These will be put to good use.
6740af41aa8bee3a7805c6e2: Hand over 2 found in raid Ripstop fabric
6740af6f51efb9b5d04871bc: Hand over 2 found in raid Fleece fabric
6740af8645d7d713fa85f3c4: Hand over 2 found in raid Aramid fiber fabric
6740af98b7502f1bee19aa40: Hand over 1 found in raid Sewing kit
673f0b6c85753ffd03ad5f34 description: I'll take your return as a sign you're ready for more work. A bunch of ex-USEC operators holed themselves up in that old water treatment plant near the Lighthouse and it's keeper. He's called me about a noise complaint, and wants those so-called "Rogues" knocked down a peg. Three of them should make the message clear. By the way, while you're there... ex-military and energy drinks go hand-in-hand. See if you can find me some - and I do mean find, Operator. I'll know if you've bought it from a trader. I want fresh, untampered cans. Bring four. Thank you, Operator.
673f0b6c85753ffd03ad5f34 startedMessageT: Make it quick. Every second those filthy dogs breathe, they damage the safety of Tarkov.
673f0b6c85753ffd03ad5f34 successMessageT: Well done, Operator! Your talents astound even me, and I'm eager to explore more opportunities together. Return soon, the black market has much to offer you.
673f0b6c85753ffd03ad5f34 completePlayerM: Well done, Operator! Your talents astound even me, and I'm eager to explore more opportunities together. Return soon, the black market has much to offer you.
673f0a2b5b3e79f8600e5276: Eliminate 3 Rogues all over the Tarkov territory
673f0a4ce5cea974b21a2a05: Hand over 4 found in raid Can of Hot Rod energy drink
673f0daebb711e9700b60899 description: Operator, you've kept earning my trust again and again. This time, the task I have for you is of monumental importance. TerraGroup agents have found their new home - with the Svetloosersky "brothers". Find where they stored their gear. Sources tell me there's been increased activity around a temporary USEC encampment in the nature reserve. I heard Prapor screaming about a missing convoy near there, so expect trouble. There should be a field hospital there too, so bring me some CMS surgical kits. Once you've located and acquired their resources, bring the population of these Svetloozerskiy dogs down by a few - let's say five of them.
673f0daebb711e9700b60899 startedMessageT: Good luck, Operator. Shadows guide you.
673f0daebb711e9700b60899 acceptPlayerMes: Good luck, Operator. Shadows guide you.
673f0daebb711e9700b60899 completePlayerM: Operator, Your dedication and skills are truly impressive. Keep it up.
673f0ca2de2bbb23be861666: Eliminate 5 undercover TerraGroup agents on Woods
673f0cbf2421ebcacf3c0c31: Hand over 3 found in raid CMS surgical kit
673f0ccfa0f84cd48639d353: Locate the abandoned USEC camp on Woods
673f0f4d219756e158de7ab3 description: Operator, allow me to introduce to you... to the 'Predator'. Thrown into a cage at a young age, they endured unthinkable cruelty - treated as a mere dog with a twisted piece of corrugated hose used as a leash. Retrieve the lost collar that once served as the shackle around the Predator's neck. Fetch it.
673f0f4d219756e158de7ab3 startedMessageT: With haste, Operator, there's no time to waste. Gain his loyalty and come back for your reward.
673f0f4d219756e158de7ab3 successMessageT: Good work, Operator. We are thoroughly impressed with your skills. Our paths will cross again. Shadows guide you until then.
673f0f4d219756e158de7ab3 completePlayerM: Good work, Operator. We are thoroughly impressed with your skills. Our paths will cross again. Shadows guide you until then.
673f0eded04fde6ca2a02259: Hand over 1 found in raid Denis' collar
6740b5875ef4d62a019c51f2 description: Operator, I'm glad to see you again. Listen carefully - you must head to the shore. Grab a suppressed weapon, dress as the embodiment of death, and reap the souls of the savages. With haste, Operator, time is a valuable thing.
6740b5875ef4d62a019c51f2 acceptPlayerMes: With haste Operator. There's no time to waste. Hunt those animals down, leave nobody alive.
6740b5875ef4d62a019c51f2 successMessageT: Well done, Operator. Rest up, and get ready for the next one. Stay in touch.
6740b5875ef4d62a019c51f2 completePlayerM: Well done, Operator. Rest up, and get ready for the next one. Stay in touch.
6740b3671916a668a4416b64: Eliminate 10 Scavs using a suppressed weapon while wearing the Skull mask on Shoreline
6740b3f6bebbc247c1c2bbde: Eliminate 6 Scavs Between the time period of 21:00 - 04:00 on Shoreline
6740b70d0c2f488b92d69575 description: Operator, I come bearing news of the Predator's recent operation at the customs terminal. Find me the train wagon he used to infil. He did some dirty work around the area, dirty enough for one of the big bosses to come clean it up - I think 'Reshala' was his name. Anyways, leave the Predator some rations. 3 Water Bottles and 2 MREs should be enough. Good luck.
6740b70d0c2f488b92d69575 startedMessageT: Operator, I come bearing news of the Predator's recent operation at the customs terminal. Find me the train wagon they used to infil. He did some dirty work around the area, dirty enough for one of the big bosses to come clean it up - I think 'Reshala' was his name. Anyways, leave the Predator some rations. 3 Water Bottles and 2 MREs should be enough. Good luck.
6740b70d0c2f488b92d69575 acceptPlayerMes: Very well, Operator. I hope our paths cross again. Stay vigilant until then.
6740b70d0c2f488b92d69575 successMessageT: Good work, Operator. Shadows guide you.
6740b70d0c2f488b92d69575 completePlayerM: Good work, Operator. Shadows guide you.
6740b6423db677e567569c2a: Visit the train wagon used by the 'Predator' to sneak into Customs
6740b64a4ecf20026c9bc562: Place 3 Water Bottles in the train wagon
6740b66b5755c252346803f0: Place 2 MRE Ration pack in the train wagon
6741d2a8ee39dbd555b6468d description: A rumour was started by a few ex-cultists once under my command. Hunt them down. They know too much to be captured, and are too dangerous to be kept alive. Though our tongues were bound by the Blade, I worry they would bark like dogs at the right moment... and the wrong time.
6741d2a8ee39dbd555b6468d startedMessageT: A rumour was started by a few ex-cultists once under my command. Hunt them down. They know too much to be captured, and are too dangerous to be kept alive. Though our tongues were bound by the Blade, I worry they would bark like dogs at the right moment... and the wrong time.
6741d2a8ee39dbd555b6468d successMessageT: Well done, Operator. Rest assured, your actions won't go unnoticed.
6741d2a8ee39dbd555b6468d completePlayerM: Very well, Operator. Rest assured, your actions won't go unnoticed.
6741cfb9b4e9db7012b95bb9: Eliminate 4 Rogue Cultist Warriors between the time period of 21:00 - 04:00 on Customs
6741d0bc53ea6a450ccd6655: Eliminate 4 Rogue Cultist Warriors between the time period of 21:00 - 04:00 on Woods
6741d1b37b308fe38323970b: Eliminate 2 Rogue Cultist Priests the time period of 21:00 - 04:00 on Shoreline
6741d50ae7f5bd50d5034129 description: Operator, I'm glad you're here. Sit down. This little secret must stay between the two of us.. You know those cottages near the health resort? That's where that son of a bitch 'Sanitar' is holed up, with his cowardly group of "orderlies" scattered around. Ah... nevermind, just bring me some intel - physical and digital - along with some cameras and signal jammers. I'm going to plant some surveillance around his area. He thinks he's safe, and I want to prove him wrong.
6741d50ae7f5bd50d5034129 startedMessageT: Quick as you can, but don't rush. Slow is smooth, and smooth is fast. Shadows guide you.
6741d50ae7f5bd50d5034129 acceptPlayerMes: Quick as you can, but don't rush. Slow is smooth, and smooth is fast. Shadows guide you.
6741d50ae7f5bd50d5034129 successMessageT: Well done, Operator. Let's take a look at what the cat dragged in.
6741d50ae7f5bd50d5034129 completePlayerM: Well done, Operator. Let's take a look at what the cat dragged in.
6741d4569c853f4f43afa91b: Hand over 2 found in raid Intelligence folder
6741d467700ad453e74c149c: Hand over 3 found in raid Secure flash drive
6741d6176c4b417a408d290f description: Operator, that son of a bitch slipped away and made it out of my assault on his cottage alive. He can't escape, he's more dangerous than you know. Think about it - a mere janitor has his own small laboratory in a top-secret area? It's absurd. There's more to this situation than meets the eye. He's got something I need, something of great value to our operation. I need you to track him down and ensure he doesn't leave alive. We can't let him out of our sight. This mission could be the key to unraveling the secrets TerraGroup holds, secrets that could change the course of history.
6741d6176c4b417a408d290f startedMessageT: Operator, that son of a bitch slipped away and made it out of my assault on his cottage alive. He can't escape, he's more dangerous than you know. Think about it - a mere janitor has his own small laboratory in a top-secret area? It's absurd. There's more to this situation than meets the eye. He's got something I need, something of great value to our operation. I need you to track him down and ensure he doesn't leave alive. We can't let him out of our sight. This mission could be the key to unraveling the secrets TerraGroup holds, secrets that could change the course of history.
6741d6176c4b417a408d290f acceptPlayerMes: Good news, and bad news. I'll rip off the bandage and give you the bad news first - Sanitar is still alive. The good news is, one of his guards was captured and sang like we were filming a musical. That fucking "janitor" is returning to his cottage.
6741d6176c4b417a408d290f successMessageT: Operator, you're a goddamn beast! You tore that son of a bitch apart. It's time to take back what's rightfully ours - all that damn medical gear, computers, and other hardware scattered around that shithole cottage area. Screw that bastard, and his lapdog Khabibullina.
6741d74a7ca8a4abfdf908c6 description: Operator, great news. Word has spread around Tarkov that you've eliminated Sanitar, and as a result, his rats have started to dig out his stashes. That's another opportunity to take what is rightfully ours. He left an untouched package in a villa near the Lighthouse. I've heard they made a final attempt to save that motherfucker. Go ahead and mark it - I'll send some of my boys at night. Another small request. I've been told his henchmen who were with him are dead. I need confirmation. Head to that RUAF outpost at the nature reserve - there should be a white cargo container filled with body bags. Find it, confirm the kills, and get out. Let's not make it too messy.
6741d74a7ca8a4abfdf908c6 startedMessageT: Operator, great news. Word has spread around Tarkov that you've eliminated Sanitar, and as a result, his rats have started to dig out his stashes. That's another opportunity to take what is rightfully ours. He left an untouched package in a villa near the Lighthouse. I've heard they made a final attempt to save that motherfucker. Go ahead and mark it - I'll send some of my boys at night. Another small request. I've been told his henchmen who were with him are dead. I need confirmation. Head to that RUAF outpost at the nature reserve - there should be a white cargo container filled with body bags. Find it, confirm the kills, and get out. Let's not make it too messy.
6741d74a7ca8a4abfdf908c6 successMessageT: Very well Operator. I shall inform the others. For now, wait for another call.
6741d74a7ca8a4abfdf908c6 acceptPlayerMes: Thanks again - you are a great help to the cause.
6741d68295ef994417d1dce9: Locate the medical room in the Chalet on Lighthouse
6741d6b2ddfdda359567cf38: Locate the cargo container filled with the bodies of Sanitar's men in Woods
6741d86720827d719dafa146 description: Operator, word is spreading that the Bloodhounds, led by a certain 'Den' and his scav companion 'Ryzhy,' have been making waves in Tarkov. They've garnered quite a reputation among the locals. Kharitonov contacted me, expressing concern about the Bloodhounds' release from the Arena, anticipating chaos that needs to be prevented. You're tasked with sending a message - eliminate three of the Bloodhounds as a warning, but try not to harm Den; he holds a close connection to Ivan. Plus, he could be helpful in the near future...
6741d86720827d719dafa146 acceptPlayerMes: Operator, word is spreading that the bloodhounds, led by a certain 'Den' and his scav companion 'Ryzhy,' have infiltrated the Tarkov district. They've garnered quite a reputation among the locals. Jaeger contacted me, expressing concern about the Bloodhounds' release from the Arena, anticipating chaos that needs to be quelled. We're tasked with sending a message by eliminating three of the Bloodhounds as a warning, but be cautious not to harm Den; he holds a close connection to Jaeger. And could be helpful in the near future..
6741d86720827d719dafa146 startedMessageT: You have your task. Shadows guide you.
6741d86720827d719dafa146 successMessageT: Well done, Operator. Once again, you haven't disappointed me. Stay in touch; I shall send you a message soon enough. Keep your eyes open. Den should contact Ivan any minute now.
6741d86720827d719dafa146 completePlayerM: Well done, Operator. Once again, you haven't disappointed me. Stay in touch; I shall send you a message soon enough. Keep your eyes open. Den should return to Jaeger any minute now.
6741da44d68092ca9722521a description: Welcome back - hey, you seem really off. Bloodhounds didn't treat you well, did they? Sit, you need to get some rest. I'll make you some great medicine, one of a kind. Just make sur- agh. I ran out of materials. Well, Operator, rest first, head back out to find what we need.
6741da44d68092ca9722521a startedMessageT: Welcome back - hey, you seem really off. Bloodhounds didn't treat you well, did they? Sit, you need to get some rest. I'll make you some great medicine, one of a kind. Just make sur- agh. I ran out of materials. Well, Operator, rest first, head back out to find what we need.
6741da44d68092ca9722521a successMessageT: Well done, pal. I hope this could help your current state. We have some serious work ahead of us, so be sure to rest enough before I reach out again.
6741d9654837878a48e6f6c2: Hand over 2 found in raid Medical bloodsets
6741d971e47806057a4d2137: Hand over 5 found in raid Medical tools
6741d97ef44b688e5521c95f: Hand over 1 found in raid Disposable syringe
6741d988eebead03c75d029e: Hand over 3 found in raid 42 Signature Blend English Tea
6741d99c87a53b9d6856c2f2: Hand over 2 found in raid Bottle of water (0.6L)
6741d9b13ffb6d639c02c353: Hand over 2 found in raid Bottle of hydrogen peroxide
6741dbba9e6d28c8ff0a700f description: Pal, let me tell you about this little adventure ahead of us. Our message to the Bloodhounds was received. They've know you for your deeds and connections, yet undervalue your actions and skills. Den and Ryzhy came back to Ivan's hideout and explained the situation. There was a set-up in a deal conducted between a group of rogue PMCs - they played dirty tricks on the Bloodhound's dealers. That's why they made their presence known. We've been tasked with finding out what the deal was, as Den didn't say too much. I think the deal was related to a keycard belonging to TerraGroup. I want you to go and look after that. Bring me a lab access keycard.
6741dbba9e6d28c8ff0a700f startedMessageT: Pal, let me tell you about this little adventure ahead of us. Our message to the Bloodhounds was received. They've know you for your deeds and connections, yet undervalue your actions and skills. Den and Ryzhy came back to Ivan's hideout and explained the situation. Bring me a lab access keycard.

6741dbba9e6d28c8ff0a700f successMessageT: Well done! Once again, you don't disappoint. Stay in touch, I'll send you a message soon enough. Keep your eyes open.
6741dbba9e6d28c8ff0a700f completePlayerM: Well done! Once again, you don't disappoint. Stay in touch, I'll send you a message soon enough. Keep your eyes open.
6741db339f68236cae98f963: Hand over 1 TerraGroup Labs access keycard
6741dd080a4b6768df84d4ed description: Listen up, pal. I've got some grim news about those Bloodhounds wreaking havoc around Tarkov. They've pulled off a daring ambush on a TerraGroup vehicle as it navigated the streets around the customs terminal. I've got intel from the Predator on the sensitive documents stashed in that car, and where it was headed. Also, there has been rumours going around the recent van made it safely to the factories there and dumped a set of barrels in one of the abandoned factories.. I've got no idea what's in those barrels but its up to you to find out. Head there too, and mark it for me. Let me tell you - there's always a more ominous force at play. Aid me in tracking down that vehicle and the barrels. - I'll dispatch my crew to tear apart every inch of the area, extracting whatever they can. Thank you Operator.
6741dd080a4b6768df84d4ed startedMessageT: Listen up, pal. I've got some grim news about those Bloodhounds wreaking havoc around Tarkov. 6741dd080a4b6768df84d4ed successMessageT: Well done once again. Rest up, pal.
6741dc8582ce97dba7a61ac7: Locate the ambushed TerraGroup vehicle in Customs
6741dc9f5f87377b77685608: Locate the dumped barrels in Customs
6741de5af218c3a4a71f659e description: Pal, the Predator informed me of yet another location in need of some tied up loose ends - this time it's the chemical plant. Use caution when entering, and get rid of any informants so they won't be able to pass the information of your arrival. It seems there's an abandoned medical tent near one of the exits. I need you to grab a sample and mark the hazmat suit, as there are traces of that strange liquid similar to what you found inside those barrels. Mark the medical boxes too, I'll send my men to retrieve the materials.
6741de5af218c3a4a71f659e startedMessageT: Pal, the Predator informed me of yet another location in need of some tied up loose ends - this time it's the chemical plant. 6745faad87494344ac6986e7 description: Heed this: the Predator has whispered of the cultists' return to the shadows of Tarkov. My men... have fallen victim to these bastards, their gear now lost to the abyss. It falls upon you to reclaim what's ours. There will be ample compensation for your efforts. This task is of the utmost importance, that gear is critical to our operation. Fetch it.
6745faad87494344ac6986e7 startedMessageT: Heed this: the Predator has whispered of the cultists' return to the shadows of Tarkov. 6745faad87494344ac6986e7 successMessageT: Well done. At least we haven't lost everything.

6745f92f7f5b0504ec340c65: Hand over 1 found in raid Cultist knife
6745f943d7302b2e69c368c8: Eliminate 2 Cultists all over the Tarkov territory
6745fdae9426c1e4a9fd5772 description:
Dear friend, 

 I am leaving you this note as we head out to gather resources. Once again, I require your assistance. My comrades and I are preparing to assault the remaining TerraGroup assets. While we are armed, our current arsenal falls short of what we're expecting to face. I kindly request your aid in acquiring: 
- 3 M4A1s 
- 2 AKMs 
-Ample ammunition for each 

 Perhaps you could approach some of the traders - they might be aware of our plans and willing to help. Your support is invaluable. 

Thank you, 
Artem

6745fdae9426c1e4a9fd5772 completePlayerM: I'm glad you got my note. I'll send you another message soon.
6745fc4c6ef5e56ba5df91cc: Hand over 3 found in raid Colt M4A1 5.56x45 assault rifle
6745fc99a2d6bac958157a53: Hand over 2 found in raid Kalashnikov AKM 7.62x39 assault rifle
67462d52d129aa9ebc6eb98d description: Friend, our raid went off without a hitch. The TerraGroup building was swarming with targets, but they scattered like insects after shots were fired. However, something peculiar caught my attention inside... Behind a locked door, I heard a familiar sound - an enigma I couldn't unravel. I attempted to breach the door but my shotgun did nothing. There's definitely something unusual happening behind it. I consulted an acquaintance skilled in the art of lockpicking. He mentioned a key known mysteriously as the something 'Meeting Room Key' that should get you in. Find this key. The room lies deep within the TerraGroup security post building on Tarkov's streets. Discover what secrets await inside.
67462d52d129aa9ebc6eb98d startedMessageT: Friend, our raid went off without a hitch. The TerraGroup building was swarming with targets, but they scattered like insects after shots were fired. However, something peculiar caught my attention inside... Behind a locked door, I heard a familiar sound - an enigma I couldn't unravel. I attempted to breach the door but my shotgun did nothing. 67462d52d129aa9ebc6eb98d acceptPlayerMes: Friend, our raid went off without a hitch. The TerraGroup building was swarming with targets, but they scattered like insects after shots were fired. However, something peculiar caught my attention inside... Behind a locked door, I heard a familiar sound - an enigma I couldn't unravel. I attempted to breach the door but my shotgun did nothing. There's definitely something unusual happening behind it. I consulted an acquaintance skilled in the art of lockpicking. He mentioned a key known mysteriously as the something 'Meeting Room Key' that should get you in. Find this key. The room lies deep within the TerraGroup security post building on Tarkov's streets. Discover what secrets await inside.

67463059a075ba4f50c0e396 description: My crew found out two things - One, Dennis has become entangled in this somehow. It suggests we've stumbled onto something serious. He shared details about those mysterious blue tapes you witnessed playing in the meeting room. It seems they're preparing for another EMP attack on Tarkov, but there's a crucial missing piece to this puzzle that eludes me. Two, I've also received word about members of my former crew lurking in the shadows of Customs warehouses, perhaps even collaborating with the Goons at the Fortress. Head there under the cover of night, and take these with you.

6746319d051c463a810728fc description: Pal, it's time for you to visit the Lab. My last crew unfortunately didn't make it back from their expedition down there, but we did manage to retrieve some valuable information related to our operation. Before they exited, one of them spotted an unknown material spilled all over the yellow tent, but had no means of analyzing whatever it was. Bring a gas analyzer and study it. They also discovered a laptop emitting similar signals to the one Sanitar had in his wardrobe, behind a locked door. The crew mentioned a glassed meeting room, and that's where our conversation ended, so pick up your gear, prepare, and retrieve the information. Good luck, friend.

67464750efd379bfffb1d539 description: It's time to hit TerraGroup, but we need to hit hard. Samoylov and I developed a more stable and efficient version of a USB Rubber Duck - lets call it a USB Groovey Duck. On your last journey in Labs, you most likely have already stumbled upon the numerous server racks scattered around. Plug it in and dump all the intel you can. We need this information for our coming assault on TerraGroup. Oh, last but not least, head over to Sanitar's workplace - you should be able to find more valuable information about his connections with Khabibullina. Be careful upon exiting and avoid getting shot, it's heavily patrolled by Raiders and PMCs.

674652a3507f4bb1aecd1086 description: Buddy, glad to see you once again. Sit down. Sergey discovered some information about two of the so-called 'False Prophets.' It seems they are a group of men who hold enough power to influence weak-minded people, earning their trust with mere charisma. One of these guys used to work as a janitor at Chemical Plant No. 16, the other  They are brothers, no idea of their real names but they go by 'Killa' and 'Tagilla', two very powerful figures here in Tarkov. Locate them in order to reveal the location of our next 'False Prophet'.
